Articles.Content:
Hi,

I am new to the forums (as you'll notice), and am wondering if it's okay for me to post a link to my twitch channel, which is used to stream KSP. I read through the rules, but wasn't sure, and thought I'd ask. 

(can you believe this forum name wasn't taken?! lol)

- Thanks in advance!

OzzyInSpace ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

Welcome aboard!

We have a whole subforum dedicated to that sort of thing: [Live From Mission Control](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/53). Feel free to share your stream and/or videos there.
